item.text: A man with crushed or severed genitals may not enter the assembly of the Lord.
A person of illegitimate birth may not enter the assembly of the Lord; to the tenth generation no one related to him may do so.
No Ammonite or Moabite may enter the assembly of the Lord; to the tenth generation none of their descendants shall ever do so,

<st data-num="05921 01697 0834">for</st> they did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06923" class="">meet</st> you with <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st> and <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> on the <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> as you <st data-num="03318" class="">came</st> from <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>, and <st data-num="0834" class="">furthermore</st>, they <st data-num="07936 05921">hired</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01109" class="">Balaam</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="01160" class="">Beor</st> of <st data-num="06604" class="">Pethor</st> in <st data-num="0763" class="">Aram Naharaim</st> to <st data-num="07043" class="">curse</st> you.
But the Lord your God refused to listen to Balaam and changed the curse to a blessing, for the Lord your God loves you.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01875" class="">seek</st> <st data-num="07965" class="">peace</st> and <st data-num="02896" class="">prosperity</st> for them through <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">ages</st> <st data-num="05769" class="">to come</st>.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08581" class="">hate</st> an <st data-num="0130" class="">Edomite</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is your <st data-num="0251" class="">relative</st>;<n id="1" /> you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08581" class="">hate</st> an <st data-num="04713" class="">Egyptian</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> you <st data-num="01961" class="">lived</st> as a <st data-num="01616" class="">foreigner</st><n id="2" /> in his <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.
Children of the third generation born to them may enter the assembly of the Lord.
When you go out as an army against your enemies, guard yourselves against anything impure.

<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">there is</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">someone</st> among you <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> <st data-num="03808 02889">impure</st> because of some <st data-num="03915" class="">nocturnal</st> <st data-num="07137" class="">emission</st>,<n id="1" /> he must <st data-num="03318 0413 02351">leave</st> the <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st>; he may <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0935 0413 08432">reenter</st> <st data-num="04264" class="">it</st> immediately.
When evening arrives he must wash himself with water, and then at sunset he may reenter the camp.
You are to have a place outside the camp to serve as a latrine.

You must <st data-num="01961" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="03489" class="">spade</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">among</st> your other <st data-num="0240" class="">equipment</st>, <st data-num="01961" class="">and</st> when you <st data-num="03427" class="">relieve</st> yourself<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st> you must <st data-num="02658" class="">dig a hole</st> with the spade<n id="2" /> and then <st data-num="07725" class="">turn</st> and <st data-num="03680" class="">cover</st> your <st data-num="06627" class="">excrement</st>.<n id="3" />

For the Lord your God walks about in the middle of your camp to deliver you and defeat your enemies for you. Therefore your camp should be holy, so that he does not see anything indecent among you and turn away from you.
You must not return an escaped slave to his master when he has run away to you.
Indeed, he may live among you in any place he chooses, in whichever of your villages he prefers; you must not oppress him.
There must never be a sacred prostitute among the young women of Israel nor a sacred male prostitute among the young men of Israel.

You must never bring the pay of a female prostitute or the wage of a male prostitute into the temple of the Lord your God in fulfillment of any vow, for both of these are abhorrent to the Lord your God.
You must not charge interest on a loan to your fellow Israelite, whether on money, food, or anything else that has been loaned with interest.

You may lend with interest to a foreigner, but not to your fellow Israelite; if you keep this command the Lord your God will bless you in all you undertake in the land you are about to enter to possess.
When you make a vow to the Lord your God you must not delay in fulfilling it, for otherwise he will surely hold you accountable as a sinner.

<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="02308" class="">refrain</st> from <st data-num="05087" class="">making a vow</st>, it will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="02399" class="">sinful</st>.
Whatever you vow, you must be careful to do what you have promised, such as what you have vowed to the Lord your God as a freewill offering.

<st data-num="03588" class="">When</st> you <st data-num="0935" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyard</st> of your <st data-num="07453" class="">neighbor</st> you may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="07648" class="">as many</st> <st data-num="06025" class="">grapes</st> as you <st data-num="05315" class="">please</st>,<n id="1" /> but you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">take away</st> any <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="03627" class="">container</st>.<n id="2" />
When you go into the ripe grain fields of your neighbor you may pluck off the kernels with your hand, but you must not use a sickle on your neighborâ€™s ripe grain.
